name: Ejen2u International Sdn Bhd
description: Developer of a reseller ecosystem platform intended to help business owners manage resellers like stockists, agents, and dropships. The company's platform is integrated, digitalized, and data-driven and offers systematic product ordering, detailed reporting, commissions, reward systems, databases, and performance monitoring among others, enabling businesses to improve productivity and profitability.
one_liner: Developer of a reseller ecosystem platform intended to help business owners manage resellers like stockists, agents, and dropships. The company's platform is integrated, digitalized, and data-driven and offers systematic product ordering, detailed reporting, commissions, reward systems, databases, and performance monitoring among others, enabling businesses to improve productivity and profitability.
